privacyPolicyDescription:
Smart Work places great importance on protecting your privacy. We are committed to safeguarding the personal information you provide to us. We process your personal data within the framework of the law and solely for the purpose of delivering effective and innovative services, preventing fraud, and addressing security issues; unless doing so would jeopardize your interests, fundamental rights, and freedoms. 
 
 What information does Smart Work collect? 
 Basic information such as first and last name, phone number, email, and profile picture used for user registration. Additionally, we store traffic hours, login/logout times, and the amount of work done on each project on our servers so that you can always access them from any device without the need for third-party backups. Throughout this process, we make every effort to protect your personal information. Moreover, to provide optimal services, we may utilize data such as location information stored by business owners. 
 
 We periodically evaluate and update these policies. Changes to these policies will be implemented when we release a new version and you can review the latest privacy policy changes on the Smart Work website. Significant changes to this strategy will be communicated to you through the Smart Work application. 
 
 If you have any concerns, questions, or comments about changes to our privacy policies, please contact us and share your feedback via email at info@medsaco.com.
